name: Blind Seer

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in all battles by 34%

skills.name: Visions of Death
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 15%.
Level: 2 Damage +5%
Level: 3 Damage +10%
Level: 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level: 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then places a [Shield] buff on all allies for equal to 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP for 2 turns.
Level: 2 Shield +5%
Level: 3 Shield +5%
Level: 4 Shield +5%
Level: 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Self Sacrifice
skills.raw_description:
Revives all dead allies to 35% HP. Places a [Block Damage] buff on all allies except this Champion for 1 turn.
Level: 2 Heal +5%
Level: 3 Heal +5%
Level: 4 Heal +5%
Level: 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Dark Elves
faction.default_description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 40 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Blind Seer is a legendary assist champion from the faction Dark Elves doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Blind Seer is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Blind Seer

default_description: Blind Seer is a legendary assist champion from the faction Dark Elves doing void damage
